description.value:
Aura 3

Any enemy that ends its turn within the aura takes 15 damage. Creatures within the aura have concealment against ranged attacks. While Pazuzu is bloodied, the aura's size increases to 10, and enemies within the aura also cannot shift.
At the start of each of his turns, Pazuzu can choose either to slide one creature he can see 3 squares, or to make a saving throw against an effect that includes the dazed or stunned condition.

Basic Attack

At-Will

Standard

Attack: Melee 2 (one creature)

+38 vs. AC

Hit: 4d10 + 18 damage.

Recharge 4-6 ✦ poison

Standard

Effect: Pazuzu shifts 15 squares and makes the following attack against each creature he moves adjacent to during the shift.

Attack: Melee 1 (one creature); +36 vs. Reflex

Hit: 4d10 + 18 poison damage.

At-Will ✦ poison

Minor

Attack: Melee 4 (one creature)

+38 vs. Fortitude

Hit: The target takes ongoing 20 poison damage and is weakened (save ends both). This ongoing damage is not reduced by poison resistance.

Recharge when no creature is affected by this power ✦ charm, psychic

Minor

Attack: Ranged 10 (one creature)

+36 vs. Will

Hit: 5d12 + 8 psychic damage, and the target is dazed (save ends).

First Failed Saving Throw: The target is instead dominated (save ends).

system.rechargeCondition: when no creature is affected by this power

description.value:
At-Will ✦ polymorph

Minor

Effect: Pazuzu can alter his physical form to appear as any Large or smaller creature, including a unique individual, until he attacks, until he uses change shape again, or until he drops to 0 hit points. Pazuzu retains his statistics in his new form. His clothing, armor, and other possessions do not change. To assume a specific individual's for, Pazuzu must have seen that individual. Other creatures can make a DC 31 Insight check to discern that the form is a disguise.

At-Will ✦ charm

Triggered

Trigger: An enemy attacks Pazuzu.

Attack (Immediate Interrupt): Close burst 10 (one enemy)

+38 vs. Will

Hit: Pazuzu slides the target 1 square, then the target uses an at-will attack power of Pazuzu's choice against the triggering enemy as a free action. If this attack hits, the triggering attack also takes a -4 penalty to the attack roll.

3/Encounter

Triggered

Trigger: Pazuzu takes acid, cold, fire, lightning, or thunder damage.

Effect (Free Action): Pazuzu gains resist 30 to the triggering damage type until the end of the encounter or until he uses variable resistance again.

system.biography:
HP 1252; Bloodied 626
Immune prone, slowed 		Init +36 | AP 2 | Save +5
AC 48Fort 44Ref 48Will 47
Speed 6, fly 12 (hover), teleport 6
Ability ScoresStr 32 (+27)
Con 41 (+31)		Dex 46 (+34)
Int 31 (+26)		Wis 29 (+25)
Cha 48 (+35)
Languages Abyssal, Common, telepathy 10
Alignment Chaotic Evil
Skills Intimidate +21Senses Blindsight 20,Low-light vision
Passive Perception 35 | Insight 35
